stimulusHtml: Which of the following is a Buddhist tradition that is embodied in the design of the Borobudur Temple?
choicesHtml: Glorifying human love as an embodiment of divine union
Dressing a statue of the Buddha in splendid garments
Venerating a reliquary statue of the Buddha in a shrine below the central stupa
Circumambulating the temple as a parallel to a devotee's spiritual journey
